results.content:
You Could Have Explained Fundamentals Of Framework In An Organized Way,                                                                     
1. Explaining Framework Structure Always In Respective With  Differences Of Core PHP & Laravel, 
2. You Could Have Explained With Step By Step Procedural Way For Implementing Any Feature, Like First We Need To Go Terminal Create Middleware, Planning For Route And So On...          3. Initially Your Tutorial Was Slow And Was Going In Perfect Phase, After Sometime When Explaining You Were Too Fast ...
